setupDescription.message: It looks like you have never used Simple Time Tracker before on this machine. You might have used it before. If so, select 'Setup using existing account' below. If you are new to Simple Time Tracker, select 'Setup using new account'.
setupDescription.description: Description of how to set up a new time tracker.

setupNewLink.description: Label on the setup using new account link

setupExistingLink.description: Label on the setup using existing account link

startTimer.description: Label on the button, when the timer can be started.

stopTimer.description: Label on the button, when the timer can be stopped.
